person.persName: Isaac Price Miller (Jefferson co. farmer & politician)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, planter and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Anna Miller. Father of Alice Miller, Robert Miller, Isaac Miller, Florence Miller, and Juliet Miller. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Jefferson County in 1842, 1845, and 1847. Owned twenty-six enslaved people in 1850. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Jefferson County from 1851 to 1855. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned twenty-six enslaved people in 1860. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Jefferson County from August 1862 to March 1863.
